description.value: This industry comprises establishments primarily engaged in weaving broadwoven fabrics and felts (except tire fabrics and rugs). Establishments in this industry may weave only, weave and finish, or weave, finish, and further fabricate fabric products.

job_tasks.value: High risk job tasks associated with this industry: Grind, mix, or weigh dyes or apply dyes to textiles Repeatedly prepare, card, or spin natural vegetable fibers Use epoxy, isocyanate, or formaldehyde-resin adhesives, finishes, or sealants
